title: (x) LifeStyle TV logo grotesque - House Chalet New York 1980 {Simon H}
content:
Can anyone PLEASE tell me what font is this (the LifeStyle one).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111124032559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lifestyletv_sobreblanco_5247.jpg)
author: westerninja

comments.content:
Chalet New York Nineteen Eighty from House Industries.  
 [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4](http://web.archive.org/web/20111124032559/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4")
Oh thank you very much Sihep, you give me a great help.
Please use a more descriptive title next time!

What do you mean, Eben? Robert needed help, so he wrote "HELP!!!" Very clear what he wanted, no? ;^) :^D

Seriously, Robert, this makes it very hard for us to distinguish the different ID threads. Please make our lives a little easier. ;^)
Thanks for normalizing the title thread Yves.
There is a system to it. ;^)
